text: 35 has never looked so good! Nikki & Brie Bella celebrate their birthday on Nov. 21, and we ’ re having a celebration of our own with their all - time hottest photos. The two brunette goddesses have it all : perfectly toned bodies, stunning faces, and gorgeous long locks. These ladies don ’ t only kick butt in the WWE ring, but IRL too!
